ai:cl.c: Queries the meta data of file system volumes.

ai:f.c: Total amount of storage space that is available, measured in bytes.
Total amount of storage space in use.
These read-only flags identify the type of device and its features.
A unique ID for the mounted device (platform dependent, NULL if unavailable).
The storage size of the device in bytes, without accounting for the file system format.
The volume name of the device to query.
